title: [Question] review of sem 2
content:
How to apply for script review and Revaluation of esa 
And what is the amount

comments.body:
Rs. 100 for Paper Viewing per course
Rs. 1000 for Re-evaluation per course

Is it online or do we have to go to college 
And when is reveal (approximate date)
We have to go to college. Wait for the circular for the date.
